snippet.title: Movie Review: Cats and Dogs
snippet.description: Plenty of heart and hijinks mixed with litter box humor.

snippet.title: Movie Review: Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat
snippet.description: Too mature for the kids who are reading the book.

snippet.title: Movie Review: Cats & Dogs
snippet.description: Plenty of heart and hijinks mixed with litter box humor.

snippet.title: Movie Review: The Truth About Cats & Dogs
snippet.description: Funny and intelligent, despite some flaws.

snippet.title: Movie Review: African Cats
snippet.description: Nature docu emphasizes a mother's love and sacrifice.

snippet.title: Movie Review:Marley & Me
snippet.description: Puppy love leads to a miserable, manipulative end. This 'family' movie belongs in the kind of doggie bag that you hold your nose to fill.

snippet.title: Traditional Easter Movies
snippet.description: Five movies your Easter shouldn't be without.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat
snippet.description: Reading games are much more fun than movie.

snippet.title: Movie Review:Beverly Hills Chihuahua
snippet.description: A delightful treat for young pups, parents might be surprised how much Chihuahua gets their tails wagging, too.

snippet.title: Movie Review: Horton Hears a Who!
snippet.description: Dr. Seuss' tale of elephant Horton answering the call to protect a speck of dust that harbors the tiny world and populace of Whoville.
